name: Coffeer
description:
Score-based shooter

Your goal is to shoot coffee to as much people as you can

Video from the current build:

- Prepare your coffee

press "e" near a coffee-machine to start that

- Get the coffee

press "e" near a filled coffee-machine to get a cup of coffee

- Shoot!

press "space" to shoot a CoffeeBall in front of you

- Gain points

every person who gets hitted by your CoffeeBall becames happy and goes away

that's how you make points, with people's happiness :D

- Upgrade

get more coffee machines and upgrade them to make them faster
